parsing_result:
# Resetting Custom Settings

Reset selected custom settings banks.

1. Select **IMAGE QUALITY SETTING** > **EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM SETTING** in the shooting menu and press **MENU/OK**.

   > ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
   > This assumes that you wish to reset settings for still photography.  
   > To reset movie settings, navigate to **MOVIE SETTING** in the movie menus and select **EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM SETTING**.

   !Edit/Save Custom Setting Menu

2. Highlight the desired custom settings bank and press **MENU/OK**.

   !Custom Settings Bank

3. Highlight **RESET CUSTOM SETTING** and press **MENU/OK**.  
   A confirmation dialog will be displayed.

   !Reset Custom Setting Option

4. Highlight **OK** and press **MENU/OK**.  
   The selected bank will be reset.

   !Confirmation Dialog
